Item0.Text: 融投风险处置35户重点项目分布统计表（总表）

Item3.Text: 担保集团 委贷余额

Item5.Text: 融投系无担保委贷余额

Item8.Text: 重点项目 业务总额

Item9.Text: 占本地区业务总额比例

Item10.Text: 占全省重点项目业务额比例

Reader.Name: tab_detail
Reader.Sql: SELECT DISTINCT pa.attributionName AS hostAreaName FROM pro_apply pa LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON pp.apply_ID=pa.apply_ID WHERE pa.attributionName is not null
Reader.Description: SELECT DISTINCT pa.attributionName AS hostAreaName FROM pro_apply pa LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON pp.apply_ID=pa.apply_ID WHERE pa.attributionName is not null

Reader.Name: tab_column4_1
Reader.Sql: SELECT DISTINCT pa.attributionName AS hostAreaName, SUM(IFNULL(pp.`loadSum`,0)) AS loadSum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.apply_ID=pa.apply_ID WHERE pa.attributionName IS NOT NULL ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""} GROUP BY pa.attributionName
Reader.Description: SELECT DISTINCT pa.attributionName AS hostAreaName, SUM(IFNULL(pp.`loadSum`,0)) AS loadSum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.apply_ID=pa.apply_ID WHERE pa.attributionName IS NOT NULL ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""} GROUP BY pa.attributionName

Reader.Name: tab_column6_1
Reader.Sql: SELECT SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab5.creditorsum,0))) AS guarantySum, pa.attributionName AS hostAreaName FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.factPay_ID, pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.replace_ID, pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT precre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(precre.creditor_sum,0)) AS creditorsum FROM pro_creditor precre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(precre.creditor_date,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY precre.project_ID )tab5 ON tab5.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.apply_ID=pa.apply_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client cc ON pa.client_ID=cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client_relationmain ccr ON ccr.`client_ID` = cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_relationmain cr ON cr.`clientID` = ccr.`client_ID` WHERE cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2' AND pa.attributionName IS NOT NULL ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""} GROUP BY pa.attributionName
Reader.Description: SELECT SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab5.creditorsum,0))) AS guarantySum, pa.attributionName AS hostAreaName FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.factPay_ID, pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.replace_ID, pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT precre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(precre.creditor_sum,0)) AS creditorsum FROM pro_creditor precre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(precre.creditor_date,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY precre.project_ID )tab5 ON tab5.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.apply_ID=pa.apply_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client cc ON pa.client_ID=cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client_relationmain ccr ON ccr.`client_ID` = cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_relationmain cr ON cr.`clientID` = ccr.`client_ID` WHERE cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2' AND pa.attributionName IS NOT NULL ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""} GROUP BY pa.attributionName

Reader.Name: tab_column5_1
Reader.Sql: SELECT SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab5.creditorsum,0))) AS guarantySum, pa.attributionName AS hostAreaname FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.factPay_ID, pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.replace_ID, pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT precre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(precre.creditor_sum,0)) AS creditorsum FROM pro_creditor precre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(precre.creditor_date,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY precre.project_ID )tab5 ON tab5.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.apply_ID=pa.apply_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client cc ON pa.client_ID=cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client_relationmain ccr ON ccr.`client_ID` = cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_relationmain cr ON cr.`clientID` = ccr.`client_ID` WHERE pp.busiClass= '02' AND pa.attributionName IS NOT NULL AND pa.guarantyOrgID IN ('1b6f710ce5054d1d8f9d495f7bc1e142','fbe555a29dd94ed08dacf374dcd85ead','d6f953c683ea41abb946a42fc1004642','73c1bb3d20614bdfa91281622c5b9334') AND cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""} GROUP BY pa.attributionName
Reader.Description: SELECT SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab5.creditorsum,0))) AS guarantySum, pa.attributionName AS hostAreaname FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.factPay_ID, pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.replace_ID, pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT precre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(precre.creditor_sum,0)) AS creditorsum FROM pro_creditor precre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(precre.creditor_date,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY precre.project_ID )tab5 ON tab5.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.apply_ID=pa.apply_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client cc ON pa.client_ID=cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client_relationmain ccr ON ccr.`client_ID` = cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_relationmain cr ON cr.`clientID` = ccr.`client_ID` WHERE pp.busiClass= '02' AND pa.attributionName IS NOT NULL AND pa.guarantyOrgID IN ('1b6f710ce5054d1d8f9d495f7bc1e142','fbe555a29dd94ed08dacf374dcd85ead','d6f953c683ea41abb946a42fc1004642','73c1bb3d20614bdfa91281622c5b9334') AND cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""} GROUP BY pa.attributionName

Reader.Name: tab_column3_1
Reader.Sql: SELECT DISTINCT pa.attributionName AS hostAreaName, SUM(IFNULL(pp.`loadSum`,0)) AS loadSum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.apply_ID=pa.apply_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client cc ON pa.client_ID=cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client_relationmain ccr ON ccr.`client_ID` = cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_relationmain cr ON cr.`clientID` = ccr.`client_ID` WHERE pa.attributionName IS NOT NULL AND cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""} GROUP BY pa.attributionName
Reader.Description: SELECT DISTINCT pa.attributionName AS hostAreaName, SUM(IFNULL(pp.`loadSum`,0)) AS loadSum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.apply_ID=pa.apply_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client cc ON pa.client_ID=cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client_relationmain ccr ON ccr.`client_ID` = cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_relationmain cr ON cr.`clientID` = ccr.`client_ID` WHERE pa.attributionName IS NOT NULL AND cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""} GROUP BY pa.attributionName

Reader.Name: tab_column_replace_1
Reader.Sql: SELECT pa.attributionName AS hostAreaname, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pre.apply_ID=pa.apply_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client cc ON pa.client_ID=cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client_relationmain ccr ON ccr.`client_ID` = cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_relationmain cr ON cr.`clientID` = ccr.`client_ID` WHERE pa.attributionName IS NOT NULL AND cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""} GROUP BY pa.attributionName
Reader.Description: SELECT pa.attributionName AS hostAreaname, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pre.apply_ID=pa.apply_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client cc ON pa.client_ID=cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client_relationmain ccr ON ccr.`client_ID` = cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_relationmain cr ON cr.`clientID` = ccr.`client_ID` WHERE pa.attributionName IS NOT NULL AND cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""} GROUP BY pa.attributionName

Reader.Name: tab_column8_1
Reader.Sql: SELECT pa.attributionID AS hostAreaID, pa.attributionName AS hostAreaName, COUNT(DISTINCT cr.relationMain_ID) countClient FROM ( SELECT pp.apply_ID, pp.project_ID, pp.delayBeginDate, IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab5.creditorsum,0) AS guarantySum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT precre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(precre.creditor_sum,0)) AS creditorsum FROM pro_creditor precre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(precre.creditor_date,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY precre.project_ID )tab5 ON tab5.project_ID = pp.project_ID WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""} ) pprst LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pa.apply_ID = pprst.apply_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client cc ON pa.client_ID=cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client_relationmain ccr ON ccr.`client_ID` = cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_relationmain cr ON cr.`clientID` = ccr.`client_ID` WHERE cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2' GROUP BY pa.attributionID
Reader.Description: SELECT pa.attributionID AS hostAreaID, pa.attributionName AS hostAreaName, COUNT(DISTINCT cr.relationMain_ID) countClient FROM ( SELECT pp.apply_ID, pp.project_ID, pp.delayBeginDate, IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab5.creditorsum,0) AS guarantySum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT precre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(precre.creditor_sum,0)) AS creditorsum FROM pro_creditor precre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(precre.creditor_date,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY precre.project_ID )tab5 ON tab5.project_ID = pp.project_ID WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""} ) pprst LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pa.apply_ID = pprst.apply_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client cc ON pa.client_ID=cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client_relationmain ccr ON ccr.`client_ID` = cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_relationmain cr ON cr.`clientID` = ccr.`client_ID` WHERE cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2' GROUP BY pa.attributionID

Reader.Name: tab_cloumn2_1
Reader.Sql: SELECT SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab5.creditorsum,0))) AS guarantySum, pa.attributionName AS hostAreaname FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.factPay_ID, pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.replace_ID, pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT precre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(precre.creditor_sum,0)) AS creditorsum FROM pro_creditor precre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(precre.creditor_date,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY precre.project_ID )tab5 ON tab5.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.apply_ID=pa.apply_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client cc ON pa.client_ID=cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client_relationmain ccr ON ccr.`client_ID` = cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_relationmain cr ON cr.`clientID` = ccr.`client_ID` WHERE pp.busiClass= '02' AND pa.attributionName IS NOT NULL AND cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""} GROUP BY pa.attributionName
Reader.Description: SELECT SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab5.creditorsum,0))) AS guarantySum, pa.attributionName AS hostAreaname FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfp.factPay_ID, pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pre.replace_ID, pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT precre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(precre.creditor_sum,0)) AS creditorsum FROM pro_creditor precre WHERE 1=1 ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(precre.creditor_date,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} GROUP BY precre.project_ID )tab5 ON tab5.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN pro_apply pa ON pp.apply_ID=pa.apply_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client cc ON pa.client_ID=cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_client_relationmain ccr ON ccr.`client_ID` = cc.client_ID LEFT JOIN crm_relationmain cr ON cr.`clientID` = ccr.`client_ID` WHERE pp.busiClass= '02' AND pa.attributionName IS NOT NULL AND cr.projectTypeID = '44950f5de8614f1588841a9556ba52a2' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y-%m')<='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""} GROUP BY pa.attributionName
